creator: g_lupo@libero.it
text:
Hi, 
I've created a nested collection in the "db" root. After I've inserted a test 
document in the leaf of this gerarchy. When I'm trying to look the result via 
http (as specified in the admin guide) i receive this error:

"File Not Found: d:\user\hobbies\xml-xindice-
1.0/./docs/db/collections/data/ent_k1.xml"

The url that i call is:
http://blueone:4080/db/collections/data/ent_k1.xml

where blueone is my computer's name.

Good work

creator: g_lupo@libero.it
text:
I'm sorry for the mistake. I've read wrong the documentation.
There is no bug.
Gianluca
